QuestData.Title: The New Path
QuestData.Description:
Today, a new paragon is anointed. And for the first time since the dawn of our realm, a temple is rededicated to represent our devotion to one another.
A new paragon, a new sigil, and a new path for all kyrian.
This ceremony shall be glorious indeed!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Kalisthene to take part in the ceremony at the Seat of the Archon.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Adrestes, Paragon of Devotion.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Kleia to begin the ceremony
